name: Freedom Dash
description:
My first game jam ever!!

Will probably upload a devlog for this game sometime soon on my youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/thelulz/

Might continue this, didn't get to add everything i wanted but hey it's got all the important bits.

I would've uploaded the webgl build but for some reason it didn't work.

Pretty short will take 5-10 minutes to complete maybe idk.

I'm realising now that the quit button doesn't work for some reason oh god it's 2am help, At least you can still quit by pressing escape.
